content:
If your friend happens to be away and you can't visit...
Let me introduce you to Mobai's recommended 
<color=#8AAB4B>"Weekly Street Picks"</color>.
info: 介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2
介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
No problem!
Checking Lumia connection status,
Ready to head out~!
info: 介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: For example, we can visit our friends' homes now, but you'll need to become <color=#8AAB4B>Yoohoo friends</color> and stay in touch to visit them.
info: 介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Oh right! Glenn asked me to tell you,
"Don't forget to bring your <color=#8AAB4B>mushroom spores</color> with you!"
Apparently, the spores are different in each bubble world!
info: 介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Take our spore packs to shops in the Neighbor worlds,
sell them for <color=#8AAB4B>high prices</color>, bring their spore packs
back to Glenn, and he'll buy them at premium prices too!
info: 介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
I mean, no matter how much work there is to do,
you've gotta go out and have fun!
Especially when it comes to hanging out with friends.
info: 介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Loomi Co. recommends tasteful Astralinks every week
for Neighbors to visit.
Let me check this week's featured streets...
info: 介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
When you want to visit your friends later,
you can contact them directly using <color=#8AAB4B>"Yoohoo Friends"</color>.
Great! Please select which friend's Astralink you'd like to visit.
info: 介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Roger that!
Checking Lumia connection status...
Oh? I forgot to mention something.
info: 介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Alright!
Just let me know whenever you want to head out.
I'm really looking forward to taking you on a fun drive~!
info: 介绍联机拜访-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Eh~! I've talked quite a bit, haven't I?
So, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
want to head out now?
